00015 typedef struct  {
00016 
00017   /** The Octeon device to use for this request */
00018    uint32_t                 octeon_id;
00019

00049 /**
00050   Structure for passing input and output buffers in the request structure.
00051 */
00052 typedef struct {
00053 
00054   /** number of buffers */
00055    uint32_t        cnt;
00056

00064 #ifndef CVM_SUPPRESS_DEPRECATED_WARNINGS
00065 __attribute__ ((deprecated))
00066 #endif

00070 #define  OCT_SOFT_REQ_BUFPTR(buf, idx)   (buf->ptr[idx])
00071 
00072 
00073 typedef struct  {
00074 
00075   /** The input buffers and their sizes. */
00076     octeon_buffer_t           inbuf;
00077  
00078   /** The output buffer pointers and the size allocated at each pointer. */
00079     octeon_buffer_t           outbuf;
00080 
00081   /** The instruction header to be sent with this request to Octeon. */
00082     octeon_instr_ih_t         ih;
00083 
00084   /** The Input Request Header to be sent with the request to Octeon. */
00085     octeon_instr_irh_t        irh;
00086 
00087   /** The extra headers (upto 4 64-bit words) for a 64-bytes instruction. */
00088     uint64_t                    exhdr[4];
00089 
00090   /** Information about the formatting to be done to each extra header. */
00091     octeon_exhdr_info_t       exhdr_info;
00092 
00093   /** Additional information required for processing this request. Also
00094       driver returns an id identifying the request and the current status
00095       of the request in its fields.*/
00096     octeon_request_info_t     *req_info;
00097 
00098 } octeon_soft_request_t
